name: Creatures of Legend
description: You are tasked with exploring the island of the Creatures of Legend in an attempt to capture them all!  You must find 5 creatures before the next corral will unlock that will hold the next creature.  Some creatures can only be captured when they are distracted by food, or bait.  Use the base creatures; cow, goat, sheep, as bait to distract the Creatures of Legend.  Then once you have captured enough, come on home to store them in their own corral.  Can you capture ALL of the Creatures of Legend?
